titleStmt.title: True newes from [Mecare:] and also out of Worcestershire
titleStmt.author: Drucateen, James.

notesStmt.note: The end of the Mecare news is dated 26 Jan. 1597, and the compiler's name is given as James Drucateen -- STC.
Imperfect; title page cropped and torn, with some loss of print.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
